type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️ ## Custom Footstep --- [Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/custom_footstep) Modifies the footstep sound of the entity that has the power. Type ID: `apugli:custom_footstep` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "apugli:custom_footstep", "sound": "minecraft:block.amethyst_block.break" } ``` This example will replace the footstep of the entity that has the power with the `minecraft:block.amethyst_block.break` sound event.
```json { "type": "apugli:custom_footstep", "muted": true, "condition": { "type": "apoli:on_block", "block_condition": { "type": "apoli:in_tag", "tag": "minecraft:wool" } } } ``` This example will mute the footstep of the entity that has the power if the said entity is standing on any kind of Wool block.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️ ## Custom Footstep --- [Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/custom_footstep) Modifies the footstep sound of the entity that has the power. Type ID: `apugli:custom_footstep` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "apugli:custom_footstep", "sound": "minecraft:block.amethyst_block.break" } ``` This example will replace the footstep of the entity that has the power with the `minecraft:block.amethyst_block.break` sound event.
```json { "type": "apugli:custom_footstep", "muted": true, "condition": { "type": "apoli:on_block", "block_condition": { "type": "apoli:in_tag", "tag": "minecraft:wool" } } } ``` This example will mute the footstep of the entity that has the power if the said entity is standing on any kind of Wool block.

muted.description: Determines whether the footstep should be muted.
muted.markdownDescription: Determines whether the footstep should be muted.

sound.description: If specified, this sound event is played.
sound.markdownDescription: If specified, this sound event is played.

sounds.description: If specified, these sound events are played in a random fashion.
sounds.markdownDescription: If specified, these sound events are played in a random fashion.

volume.description: Determines the volume of the sound event(s) being played.
volume.markdownDescription: Determines the volume of the sound event(s) being played.

pitch.description: Determines the pitch of the sound event(s) being played.
pitch.markdownDescription: Determines the pitch of the sound event(s) being played.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Custom Footstep date: 2022-02-18

Custom Footstep

Power Type

Modifies the footstep sound of the entity that has the power.

Type ID: apugli:custom_footstep

Fields

Field Type Default Description
muted Boolean false Determines whether the footstep should be muted.
sound Weighted Sound Event optional If specified, this sound event is played.
sounds Array of Weighted Sound Events optional If specified, these sound events are played in a random fashion.
volume Float 1.0 Determines the volume of the sound event(s) being played.
pitch Float 1.0 Determines the pitch of the sound event(s) being played.

Examples

{
    "type": "apugli:custom_footstep",
    "sound": "minecraft:block.amethyst_block.break"
}

This example will replace the footstep of the entity that has the power with the minecraft:block.amethyst_block.break sound event. 

{
    "type": "apugli:custom_footstep",
    "muted": true,
    "condition": {
        "type": "apoli:on_block",
        "block_condition": {
            "type": "apoli:in_tag",
            "tag": "minecraft:wool"
        }
    }
}

This example will mute the footstep of the entity that has the power if the said entity is standing on any kind of Wool block.
